name: Rivarefuge.org
body: Riva Refuge is a small, secular non-profit organization that helps children, youth, young women, disabled, and elderly. Presently, we have four projects that need assistance: * [Jadelle contraception program](//rivarefuge.org/jadelle-family-planning-program/) * [Scholarships for disadvantaged children/youth](//rivarefuge.org/scholarship-program/) * [Support for Girls at Anti-Female Genital Mutilation Safe-Camp in Tanzania](//rivarefuge.org/anti-fgm-drive/) * [Matisi Food and Medicine](//rivarefuge.org/matisi-food-medicine/) Our mission is to elevate the well-being of disadvantaged people, empowering them to succeed. We work in several countries in Africa and sometimes in Central America, the Caribbean and the United States. We are a volunteer only organization with no paid staff.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
